acid_bolt.name: Acid Bolt
description: Fires a spurt of acid at the target,
who continues to be burned by acid
for 1-6 points of damage per round thereafter
until the spell expires.

aura_of_death.name: Aura of Death
description: Penalizes enemy Morale, 1 per Rank.

cheat_death.name: Cheat Death
description: If the target receives a lethal wound while spell is in effect,
this spell raises him or her with partial health.

control_zombies.name: Control Zombies
description: Charms one Zombie, causing it to fight
for the party for the remainder of the battle
or until it is killed.

crushing_death.name: Crushing Death
description: Crushes the target's heart, inflicting severe
damage and frequently killing the target outright.
Only affects targets of human size or smaller.

darkness.name: Darkness
description: This spell lowers the level of light over the
battlefield to night time, making it more difficult
for Solar-aspected characters to fight effectively.

exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
description: Target loses 2 Stamina for each Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

haste.name: Haste
description: All targets within range of this spell have
their movement rate increased by 2 per Rank.
May only be cast once on each target.

spirit_shield.name: Spirit Shield
description: All friendly entities within the range of the spell
add 1 per Rank to their Protection value.

stamina.name: Stamina
description: Target gains 2 Stamina for each Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

tap_stamina.name: Tap Stamina
description: The caster drains 2 points of Stamina per rank from the target,
and adds the Stamina to his or her own.

wall_of_bones.name: Wall of Bones
description: Target is completely immobilized by a wall of bones.

wraith_touch.name: Wraith Touch
description: Spell drains 2-12 points from one randomly
chosen characteristic of the target.
